body:
or example:


```
foreach($line in $Data) {process}



<#DATA
some text here, probably something
a few lines long
#>
```


or:

```
foreach($line in $Data.SEC1) {process}
<#DATA
some text here, probably something
a few lines long
<#SEC1
more text
#>
#>
```
the array $data is magic variable (constant) content all sections

comments.author: bpayette
comments.body:
Hi @p0W3RH311 

PowerShell already has a `data` statement:
```powershell
data fooVariable
{
     ConvertFrom-StringData -StringData @'
         Text001 = Windows 7
         Text002 = Windows Server 2008 R2
'@
}
```
